engineering: Master's Degree in Engineering/Technology or equivalent with minimum CGPA 6.5 or 65%

science: Master's in Science with min 65% or CGPA 6.5 or 60% with GATE/NET/AIBHM
Master's in Engineering/Technology with min CGPA 6.5 or 65%, preference GATE

humanities: Master's in relevant discipline with min 55% or CGPA 6.5 or 60%/6.0 with UGC/CSIR-NET/AIBHM, preference NET
management: MBA/PGDM 2-year duration with min 65% or CGPA 6.5, preference GATE/NET
foreign: Regular full-time only; degrees from Indian universities treated as Indian; foreign degrees must meet minimum requirement + valid GRE/GMAT/GATE/JMET/CAT/XAT/MAT/ATMA/UGC or CSIR-NET + TOEFL/IELTS; no financial assistance
